Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bot, Chap
public abstract class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
Actor class which represents an entity that may move. When two actors collide with each other, both of them will be killed before interacting with the tile it stands on.
Author:
wangding1 300422014
